_comment_0: /category/ defines the section which key uses in controls.
_comment_1: vanilla sections: gameplay, movement, inventory, multiplayer, misc, stream.
_comment_2: /key_code/ defines the default key code for key.
_comment_3: allowed codes: 1 - 223 (keyboard), -100 - -85 (mouse), visit https://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Key_codes for more info.
_comment_4: /enabled/ flag defines key visibility in controls.
_comment_5: set it to false to remove key from controls.
_comment_6: set /key_code/ to desired value and /enabled/ to false and it will be unchangeable by player.
_comment_7: set /key_code/ to 0 (zero) and /enabled/ to false to remove key from game.

rewrite_controls._comment_0: rewrite controls with this config settings on first mod load.

attack._comment: default - category: gameplay, key code: -100 (BUTTON0 - left click), enabled: true

use_item._comment: default - category: gameplay, key code: -99 (BUTTON1 - right click), enabled: true

pick_block._comment: default - category: gameplay, key code: -99 (BUTTON2 - middle click), enabled: true

forward._comment: default - category: movement, key code: 17 (W), enabled: true

left._comment: default - category: movement, key code: 30 (A), enabled: true

back._comment: default - category: movement, key code: 31 (S), enabled: true

right._comment: default - category: movement, key code: 32 (D), enabled: true

jump._comment: default - category: movement, key code: 57 (SPACE), enabled: true

sneak._comment: default - category: movement, key code: 42 (LSHIFT - left shift), enabled: true

sprint._comment: default - category: movement, key code: 29 (LCONTROL - left control), enabled: true

inventory._comment: default - category: inventory, key code: 18 (E), enabled: true

drop._comment: default - category: inventory, key code: 16 (Q), enabled: true

chat._comment: default - category: multiplayer, key code: 20 (T), enabled: true

player_list._comment: default - category: multiplayer, key code: 15 (TAB - tab), enabled: true

command._comment: default - category: multiplayer, key code: 53 (SLASH - /), enabled: true

screenshot._comment: default - category: misc, key code: 60 (F2), enabled: true

toggle_perspective._comment: default - category: misc, key code: 63 (F5), enabled: true

smooth_camera._comment: default - category: misc, key code: 0 (NONE), enabled: true

stream_start_stop._comment: default - category: stream, key code: 64 (F6), enabled: true

stream_pause_unpause._comment: default - category: stream, key code: 65 (F7), enabled: true

stream_commercial._comment: default - category: stream, key code: 0 (NONE), enabled: true

stream_toggle_mic._comment: default - category: stream, key code: 0 (NONE), enabled: true

fullscreen._comment: default - category: misc, key code: 87 (F11), enabled: true

hotbar_1._comment: default - category: inventory, key code: 2 (1), enabled: true

hotbar_2._comment: default - category: inventory, key code: 3 (2), enabled: true

hotbar_3._comment: default - category: inventory, key code: 4 (3), enabled: true

hotbar_4._comment: default - category: inventory, key code: 5 (4), enabled: true

hotbar_5._comment: default - category: inventory, key code: 6 (5), enabled: true

hotbar_7._comment: default - category: inventory, key code: 8 (7), enabled: true

hotbar_8._comment: default - category: inventory, key code: 9 (8), enabled: true

hotbar_9._comment: default - category: inventory, key code: 10 (9), enabled: true

quit._comment: default - category: misc, key code: 1 (ESC - escape), enabled: true

hide_gui._comment: default - category: misc, key code: 59 (F1), enabled: true

debug_menu._comment: default - category: misc, key code: 61 (F3), enabled: true

disable_shader._comment: default - category: misc, key code: 62 (F4), enabled: true
